thread.title: 'Flash' actor Victor Garber marries longtime partner | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News
thread.title_full: 'Flash' actor Victor Garber marries longtime partner | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News

author: The Canadian Press
title: 'Flash' actor Victor Garber marries longtime partner | Entertainment & Showbiz from CTV News
text:
TORONTO - It was a happy Thanksgiving for "The Flash" actor Victor Garber -- he married his longtime partner Rainer Andreesen.
Andreesen broke the news on Instagram with a photo of the pair arm-in-arm wearing matching dark suits.
A brief caption says the duo eloped in Tofino, B.C., after 16 years together.
Garber followed up by posting a photo from what appears to be the ceremony, calling the picturesque B.C. community a "magical place to tie the knot."
Andreesen, a native of Prince Rupert, B.C., is an artist and model.
Garber, who was born in London, Ont., has been nominated for an Emmy six times for guest and supporting roles and played Canadian diplomat Ken Taylor in Ben Affleck's Oscar-winning "Argo."
  YES WE DID! #justgotmarried #elopedintofino #canada @therealvictorgarber #after16years 
A photo posted by Rainer Andreesen (@rainerarts) on Oct 10, 2015 at 7:42am PDT
